mapper.select: SELECT subject_name subjectName, lecture_name lectureName, lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo FROM lecture_subject WHERE lecture_name = (SELECT l.lecture_name lectureName FROM teacher t INNER JOIN lecture l USING(teacher_name) WHERE t.account_id=#{accountId})
SELECT account_id accountId , teacher_name teacherName , teacher_gender teacherGender , teacher_birth teacherBirth , create_date createDate FROM teacher

SELECT account_id accountId , teacher_name teacherName , teacher_gender teacherGender , teacher_birth teacherBirth , teacher_email teacherEmail , teacher_address teacherAddress , teacher_detailaddress teacherDetailAddress , teacher_phone teacherPhone , create_date createDate FROM teacher WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET account_state = '탈퇴' WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND account_pw = PASSWORD(#{accountPw})
